statements: SELECT id, company_name, goal_name, current_progress, target_progress, deadline FROM csr_progress;
SELECT company_name, target_progress, current_progress, goal_name, id, deadline FROM csr_progress;
SELECT current_progress, id, deadline, company_name, goal_name, target_progress FROM csr_progress;
SELECT * FROM csr_progress;
SELECT company_name, current_progress, deadline FROM csr_progress;
SELECT * FROM csr_progress WHERE company_name = 'Example Inc.'
SELECT goal_name, current_progress, target_progress FROM csr_progress WHERE deadline > NOW()
SELECT * FROM csr_progress WHERE current_progress = target_progress OR deadline < NOW()
SELECT id, company_name, goal_name, target_progress FROM csr_progress WHERE current_progress < target_progress ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_goals, SUM(target_progress) AS total_target_progress FROM csr_progress WHERE deadline > '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM csr_goals;
SELECT goal_name, target_date FROM csr_goals ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM csr_goals WHERE progress >= 50;
SELECT report_date, progress FROM csr_reports WHERE goal_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT goal_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM csr_reports GROUP BY goal_id HAVING num_reports >= 3;
SELECT * FROM csr_goals WHERE goal_id = 1;
SELECT goal_name, target_date FROM csr_goals WHERE progress > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM csr_reports WHERE progress < 20.00 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM csr_goals JOIN csr_reports ON csr_goals.goal_id = csr_reports.goal_id;
SELECT DISTINCT goal_id, progress FROM csr_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM csr_goals;
SELECT goal_name, target_value FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value < target_value;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM csr_strategic_plan;
SELECT target_name, target_value, progress_value FROM csr_targets WHERE progress_value > 0;
SELECT goal_id, goal_name, target_value, progress_value FROM csr_goals ORDER BY goal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM csr_goals;
SELECT goal_name, target_value FROM csr_goals ORDER BY target_value DESC;
SELECT goal_name, target_value, progress_value FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value < target_value;
SELECT goal_name, progress_value FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value > 0 AND target_value - progress_value < 500;
SELECT * FROM csr_targets JOIN csr_goals ON csr_targets.goal_id = csr_goals.goal_id ORDER BY csr_targets.target_value ASC, csr_goals.goal_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM corporate_social_responsibility_goals;
SELECT goal_description, target_date FROM corporate_social_responsibility_goals WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT department_name, location FROM department_information ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM strategic_planning WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tracker_id, progress_description, progress_date FROM progress_tracking WHERE goal_id = 3 ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM corporate_social_responsibility_goals WHERE progress_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY goal_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM strategic_planning WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT department_name, department_head, location FROM department_information WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY department_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM progress_tracking WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY progress_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT goal_description, target_date, progress_status FROM corporate_social_responsibility_goals WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY target_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value < target_value ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT id, goal_name, target_value FROM csr_goals WHERE deadline_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM csr_projects ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM csr_teams WHERE team_lead LIKE '%John%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_name, report_date, LEFT(report_content, 50) AS preview FROM csr_reports;
SELECT * FROM csr_goals WHERE target_value > progress_value ORDER BY deadline_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, goal_name, progress_value FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value < target_value AND deadline_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT goal_name, progress_value, deadline_date FROM csr_goals WHERE progress_value < 50 AND deadline_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT r.report_name, r.report_date, t.team_name FROM csr_reports r JOIN csr_teams t ON r.id = t.id WHERE r.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.project_name, p.start_date, p.end_date FROM csr_projects p JOIN csr_metrics m ON p.id = m.id WHERE m.target_value > 1000 ORDER BY p.end_date ASC LIMIT 2;
